attributes.action: Fund kidney disease screening for all over 50's
attributes.additional_details: Kidney disease can grow rapidly leaving patients in a lot of pain and suffering with very little option left to prolong their lives. If regular screening for kidney disease is offered, then many lives can be saved and prolonged.
attributes.background: Kidney disease is a silent killer. It has little to no symptoms in the beginning stages. Many people are unaware of having kidney disease until either they are having a check-up for other health problems or until the disease has progressed to an advanced stage.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
